gravitycar-api.name: Gravitycar API
gravitycar-api.description: Make API calls to the local Gravitycar framework server at localhost:8081. Supports authentication, CRUD operations, and metadata queries. Model names must be capitalized (e.g., Users, Movies). Examples: GET /Users, POST /Movies, GET /metadata/models/Users

react-server.name: React Dev Server
react-server.description: Manage the React development server on port 3000. Commands: start, stop, restart, status. Automatically detaches from terminal and manages background processes.
